name: optiontips.in
overview:
NIFTY OPTION GOLDEN JACKPOT

* Daily 1-2 intraday Calls provided in nifty Options
* Low investment and huge 20-50% returns daily basis
* To maintained above 93% accuracy at all times
* Minimum 400-500% monthly Returns will be expected
* Live support on Yahoo and mobile on Market hours
* SMS delivered within 4-6 seconds through our advanced SMS Software & Servers
* Trade Daily 6-10 Lots and earn Sure 5000-10000 profits
* Perfect experience with perfect tips
* Subscription Can be Payed in our Bank.Click &#8221;Bank Details&#8221;

Sample Call

* BUY NIFTY 5000CE AT 105 TGT 125 SL 95
* BUY NIFTY 5100PE AT 121 TGT 140 SL 112

OPTION SURESHOT

* First ever Sureshot Option Tips in Indian Stock Market
* Weekly 2-3 Sureshot Option call in Nifty or stock Options
* 60-100% Returns per call
* Accuracy maintained above 98% at all times
* Minimum 900-1200% Monthly Returns will be expected
* Live support on Yahoo and mobile on Market hours
* Trade Daily 50-100 Lots and earn Sure 30000-40000 profits
* Perfect experience with perfect tips
* SMS delivered within 5-7 seconds through our advanced SMS Software
* Calls can be meant for intraday as well as for Positional basis

Sample Call

* BUY NTPC 220CA AT 4 TGT 12 SL 2
* BUY SBIN 2600CA AT 42 TGT 72 SL 35

INTRADAY BUMPER SURESHOT (EQUITIES + FUTURES)

* Trade in our sureshot intraday tips purely on Operator Moves
* Market bullish or bearish sureshot calls always fire
* Daily get 1-2 Sureshot Calls in Future & Equity
* Accuracy maintained above 98% at all times
* Minimum Earning 2-3 Lacs Per month on 3 Lacs Capital
* Live support on Yahoo and mobile on Market hours
* Trade Daily 3-5 Lots and earn Sure 25000-40000 profits
* Perfect experience with perfect tips
* SMS delivered within 5-7 seconds through our advanced SMS Software
* Calls can be meant for intraday and to be squared off the same day

Sample Call

* BUY BAJAJ AUTO @ 2600 TGT 2680 SL 2580
* SELL YES BANK AT 183 TGT 175 SL 186
